0011010000110100 1111101000111111 0 -> sum: 0010111001110011, cout: 1
1010001010000111 1011000101011101 1 -> sum: 0101001111100101, cout: 1
1100011011001001 0010100101101100 1 -> sum: 1111000000110110, cout: 0
0100000101001111 1011110111010001 0 -> sum: 1111111100100000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
